titles.title: National Aviation Heritage Area Reauthorization Act of 2019
National Aviation Heritage Area Reauthorization Act of 2019
National Aviation Heritage Area Reauthorization Act of 2019
A bill to amend the National Aviation Heritage Area Act to reauthorize the National Aviation Heritage Area.

action.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Energy and Natural Resources.

bill.summary:
National Aviation Heritage Area Reauthorization Act of 2019
This bill extends through FY2022 the authority of the Department of the Interior to provide assistance for the National Aviation Heritage Area located in Indiana and Ohio.
